description: A small island in the East Blue inhabited by unique and rare animals. Gaimon serves as the self-appointed guardian of the island's creatures, protecting them from poachers and hunters.

keyEvents.title: Buggy Arrives at Island of Rare Animals
keyEvents.description: After being launched by a large bird, Buggy crash-lands on the Island of Rare Animals, setting up his encounter with Gaimon.
keyEvents.significance: Connects Buggy's adventure to a location previously visited by the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Gaimon Meet
keyEvents.description: Buggy encounters Gaimon on the island, leading to an unexpected friendship.
keyEvents.significance: Creates an ironic connection between two characters who both know Luffy.

keyEvents.title: Alvida Arrives
keyEvents.description: Alvida appears on the island in her transformed state, meeting up with Buggy.
keyEvents.significance: The island serves as the meeting point for the future Buggy-Alvida alliance.

statusHistory.reason: Island continues to be inhabited by Gaimon and the rare animals

images.description: The Island of Rare Animals with its unique forest and animals
